page.title: 01N.E.Hants & Surrey Borders.
page.content: Our area consists of these places:- Heath End,Upper Hale, Hale, Weybourne,Badshot Lea,Runfold, N.E.Farnham and S.E.Aldershot. Most of this area is residential and as both Farnham and Aldershot railway stations are on the main line to London many people commute from here every day. The area contains Rowhill Copse an area of ancient woodland and parts of two large parklands. Farnham Park and Aldershot Park pleasantly divide the residential areas. The area around Runfold in the south east of the block is mainly farmland. There are also two small industrial estates.One is in the Aldershot area and the other is between Badshot Lea and Farnham.
